text: ysalk almushrikun 'ayuha alrswl- astkhfafa- ean waqt hulul alssaeat alty ttwedhm bha. lst fi shay' min elmha, bal marada dhlk 'iilaa allah eaza wjl, wa'iinama shank fi 'amr alsaaeat 'ana thdhr minha man ykhafha. ka'anahum yawm yarawn qiam alssaeat lam yalbathuu fi alhayat aldnya; lhwl alsaaeat 'iilaa ma bayn alzuhr 'iilaa ghrwb alshms, 'aw ma bayn tulue alshams 'iilaa nsf alnhar
